message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, don't miss out!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $125.
